definition: to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out

sentences.english: Other military installations as prescribed by the State Council and the Central Military Commission.
sentences.chinese: 國務院和中央軍事委員會規定的其他軍事設施。

sentences.english: Soldiers should not unlawfully arrest and detain civilians in military facilities.
sentences.chinese: 士兵不得非法逮捕平民，或在軍事設施中拘留平民。
